data.route_analysis: Copenhagen can be easily accessed by train or plane, with major connections from across Europe. Public transport options are robust, including buses and metro systems.
data.seasonal_patterns: Peak tourist season runs from June to August, with July being the busiest month. Travelers can expect long daylight hours and various outdoor festivals during this time.
data.climate: Summer temperatures typically range from 15째C to 25째C (59째F to 77째F), with a chance of rain. Light clothing with a waterproof layer is recommended.
data.culture: Denmark's rich history is reflected in cultural festivals, landmarks like Tivoli Gardens, and culinary experiences focusing on fresh, local ingredients.
data.attractions: Top attractions include the Little Mermaid statue, Nyhavn Harbor, and the historic Rosenborg Castle.
